com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.selection
Class AbstractListSelectionModel<C extends Component,T extends AbstractContainer,L extends ComponentEvent>

java.lang.Object
  com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.selection.AbstractListSelectionModel<C,T,L>
Type Parameters:
T - the container sub type
C - the container's child type
L - the component event subtype
All Implemented Interfaces:
Listener<L>, SelectionModel<T>, java.util.EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
DataListSelectionModel, TableSelectionModel
public abstract class AbstractListSelectionModel<C extends Component,T extends AbstractContainer,L extends ComponentEvent>
extends java.lang.Object
implements SelectionModel<T>, Listener<L>

Abstract base class for list based containers.
